
                            
                            <p>18块钱5双，送3双短袜。我看图片袜子纹理都是一样的，就是不知道有啥区别，买一单穿穿吧，最近几年穿不知道是因为穿聚酯纤维袜子穿多了还是因为作战靴还是消防体能鞋的问题，现在脱袜子一闻都有臭味，有啥方法治脚臭吖。。 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/04/234905omsiu2pjk59j41m5.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/04/234905omsiu2pjk59j41m5.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/04/234943fhmm88xvj00gj9je.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/04/234943fhmm88xvj00gj9je.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/04/234947v9hz2uz5s53wwpww.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/04/234947v9hz2uz5s53wwpww.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/04/235003vsysl0vezy20vl70.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/04/235003vsysl0vezy20vl70.jpg"> <br>  <br>  </p>
                            <p>
